questions.question: .................. of us were ill, so we didn't go to school.
questions.description: Both means first as well as the second.

questions.question: .................. of these answers is correct.
questions.description: Both would be correct here if the verb was are.

questions.question: .................. my parents are teachers.
questions.description: Both means first as well as the second.

questions.question: She kissed them ................... on the forehead.
................... my children like sports.
questions.description: Both means first as well as the second.

questions.question: I didn't like .................... of these.
questions.description: Either means one or the other.

questions.question: I can't choose between them. I like them ....................
questions.description: Both means first as well as second.

questions.question: ................... Sam nor Peter turned up today.
questions.description: Neither means none of the two.

questions.question: I don't like .................. of them.
questions.description: Neither means one of the two.

questions.question: ..................... him nor his parents were able to give a satisfactory explanation.
questions.description: Neither means none of the two.

questions.question: I have invited ................... of them.
questions.description: Both means first as well as second.
